content: Hello! This is the AI receptionist for XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services today?
Congratulations! You've won a free home service package! Call now to claim your prize!
It seems this message is not related to scheduling a home service. To keep our communication focused and useful, we will mark this contact accordingly. Thank you!
reason: Customer sent unsolicited promotional spam message.
